Session.name: Only cookies for sessions
Session.description: Must use cookies to manage sessions, don't accept session-ids in a link

Session.name: Cookie domain set
Session.description: It is recommended that you set the default domain for cookies.

Session.name: Cookie set to HTTP only
Session.description: Setting session cookies to 'http only' makes them only readable by the browser

Session.name: Session save path not set or world writeable
Session.description: Session save path should be set and writeable by only the web user

Session.name: Use of 'use_trans_sid' considered harmful
Session.description: If used 'use_trans_sid' setting puts the session ID on the URL, making it easier to hijack

Session.name: Cookie set to secure connection
Session.description: Cookie secure specifies whether cookies should only be sent over secure connections.

PHP.name: Disallow remote file open
PHP.description: Do not allow the opening of remote file resources ('Off' recommended)

PHP.name: Disallow remote file include
PHP.description: Do not allow the inclusion of remote file resources ('Off' recommended)

PHP.name: Displaying errors
PHP.description: Don't show errors in production ('Off' recommended)

PHP.name: Disable PHP signature
PHP.description: Showing the PHP signature exposes additional information

PHP.name: Disable register globals
PHP.description: The register globals setting is dangerous and has been deprecated ('Off' recommended)

PHP.name: Disable magic quotes
PHP.description: Magic quotes automatically adds quotes to incoming data ('Off' recommended)

PHP.name: Disable magic quotes at runtime
PHP.description: Magic quotes should be disabled at runtime in addition to being off for incoming data

PHP.name: Maximum post size too large
PHP.description: A too large value for the maximum post size could allow for DoS against your application

PHP.name: Register long arrays is disabled
PHP.description: Registering long arrays turns on the HTTP_*_VARS (Recommended Off)

PHP.name: Maximum input variables
PHP.description: A maximum number of input variables should be defined to prevent performance issues

PHP.name: Do not display startup errors
PHP.description: Showing startup errors could provide extra information to potential attackers

PHP.name: Restrict PHP's file system access (basedir)
PHP.description: Restricting PHP's access to the file system to a certain directory prevents file-based attacks in unauthorized areas.

PHP.name: Ensure proper error output
PHP.description: Error reporting should be different based on context, off in production

PHP.name: Define a reasonable max upload size
PHP.description: A maximum upload size should be defined to prevent server overload from large requests

PHP.name: Reduce max upload size
PHP.description: The max upload size should not be too high, to prevent server overload from large requests

PHP.name: Define a reasonable memory limit
PHP.description: A memory limit should be defined to prevent server overload from large processes

PHP.name: Reduce memory limit
PHP.description: The standard memory limit should not be too high, if you need more memory for a single script you can adjust that during runtime using ini_set()

Custom.name: Disable harmful CLI functions
Custom.description: Several functions, if enabled, can be used for remote command injection
